description: Delicious muffins! You won't stop at one.
name: Orange & White Chocolate Muffins Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: When the muffins have cooled for 5 mins, top with some jam mix and sprinkle with flaked almonds. If the muffins are too hot the jam will simply slip off. Enjoy warm or cold - they are divine!
